name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TikBlock - block TikTok videos by hashtag

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TikBlock: Instantly block and skip TikTok videos by hashtag on desktop, enhancing your browsing experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 TikBlock: Elevate Your TikTok Desktop Experience! 🚀

Welcome to TikBlock — a bespoke TikTok browsing enhancement plugin for PC and Mac users. Whether you're accessing TikTok via the desktop web or using Chrome or Edge, TikBlock brings an unprecedented personalized experience. Just  tiktok login once, and you can control your content preferences anytime, anywhere.

Got a question or just wanna say hi? 
❤️ Drop us a line at hq404vz@gmail.com. We love hearing from you!


🌟 Key Features:

✨ Instant Hashtag Block: Encounter a hashtag you dislike while scrolling through TikTok? Just tap it to block. With TikBlock, those videos will vanish from your feed.

🚀 Smart Auto-Skip: TikBlock remembers the hashtags you've blocked. When a video with a blocked hashtag appears, it automatically skips it, ensuring your browsing experience is both enjoyable and relevant.

🌐 Personalized TikTok Experience: Enjoy a tailor-made video stream. Watch what you love and never worry about content that doesn't match your interests.

🖥️ User-Friendly Interface: With its simple and intuitive operation, TikBlock allows you to effortlessly manage your preference settings without any complex procedures.

🔄 Flexible Preference Adjustment: Changed your mind? No problem! You can easily add or remove blocked hashtags at any time, ensuring your browsing experience always aligns with your current interests.

🌈 Join TikBlock and embark on a cleaner, more personalized TikTok journey! Download now for an uninterrupted video browsing experience!
